introText1: I'm José Castillo, a Frontend Developer based in El Salvador, passionate about adding value to businesses through technology. I enjoy the challenge of finding
introText2: to problems, and I love collaborating with teams to achieve excellent results.
introText3: Although I don't have formal work experience, I have dedicated time to working on both personal and company projects, focusing on frontend development and web design. I am especially passionate about ensuring that each project not only is functional but also
introText4: . My focus is on meticulous attention to detail in design and development.
introText5: I'm always up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends to provide the best solutions to my clients. My ultimate goal is to create software that is easy to use and has a significant impact on achieving client objectives.

getInTouch.title: Get in touch
getInTouch.content: Currently without a specific position, but always open to new opportunities. My inbox is available for questions, greetings, or potential collaborations. I hope to hear from you soon!

items.title: Vocational Technical in Software Development
items.description: I obtained my Vocational Technical degree in Software Development from Colegio Salarrué, where I gained knowledge in algorithms and computational logic.

items.title: Certification in HTML and CSS3
items.description: I recently completed a course and obtained a certificate in HTML and CSS3, strengthening my skills in web development and interface design.

items.title: Certification in Java and JRE (Oracle One) - Alura Latam
items.description: I achieved a certification in Java and Java Runtime Environment (JRE) through the Oracle One program at Alura Latam, strengthening my skills in Java application development.

items.title: University Studies in Computer Engineering - UCA El Salvador
items.description: I am currently pursuing my degree in Computer Engineering at the Universidad Centroamericana (UCA) in El Salvador, where I am acquiring solid knowledge in key areas of computer science and technology.

informationProfile.name: Josse Castillo
informationProfile.description: I seek the perfect harmony between aesthetics and usability, blending each line of code with visual concepts.
